tasks.title: Peda Tech for Teachers
tasks.description: Explore the world of management! In this role, leading a project through initiation, planning, execution, monitoring/controlling and completion. How do you want to manage each and every step of your life?

tasks.title: Agile Methodology
tasks.description: Agile is a project management approach that emphasizes flexibility, collaboration, and customer feedback. It breaks work into smaller iterations called sprints.

tasks.title: Story of startup
tasks.description: Create visual stories to map user journeys. This helps in understanding project flow and stakeholder needs.
